title: Tsunami warning in effect for coastal British Columbia and Alaska
body:
https://www.google.org/publicalerts/alert?aid=658a001203e08d87&a=43b367e3&hl=en&gl=CA&source=now

Looks like there'll be little to no activity where I am, but to anyone living along that area or has friends/family that do, be aware.

Stay safe. Contact loved ones.
